greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of connected set-systems covering n vertices with no singletons.
example: The A323816(4) - a(4) = 3 disconnected set-systems covering n vertices with no singletons:
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; b(n)-`if`(n=0, 0, add(
xref: Cf. A001187, A016031, A048143, A092918, A293510, A317795, A323816 (not necessarily connected), A323818 (with singletons), A323819, A323820 (unlabeled case).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 30 2019
